sentences.en: " I give a blue ticket and a bladder that I got at the slaughter - house. "
sentences.cn: “ 我给他一张蓝色票和一只从屠宰厂那儿弄来的尿泡. ”

sentences.en: As soon as the patient is a little better, I'd get a gall bladder series.
sentences.cn: 病人稍为好转, 我就给他做一次胆囊造影.

sentences.en: Between meals, bile is stored in the gall bladder.
sentences.cn: 在两餐之间, 胆汁被储存在胆囊.

sentences.en: Certain fishes have a swim bladder which aids in diffusion of gases.
sentences.cn: 有些鱼有鳔,它有助于散布气体.

sentences.en: CT Diagnosis of Cancer of Gall Bladder ( A Review of 20 Cases )
sentences.cn: 胆囊癌的ct与B超诊断 ( 附20例分析 )

sentences.en: Gallstones usually form in the gall bladder.
sentences.cn: 胆石通常是在胆囊中形成的.

sentences.en: He is a great, pompous bladder of a man.
sentences.cn: 他是个极其浮夸而且喜欢吹嘘的人.

sentences.en: Objective Preliminarily analysis of the MRI features of bladder leiomyoma.
sentences.cn: 目的初步分析并总结该病的MRI特点.

sentences.en: Sagittal MR images further demonstrated urinary bladder invasion by the appendiceal tumor.
sentences.cn: 矢状面磁振造影更进一步显示此阑尾肿瘤侵犯胱胱后壁.

sentences.en: So the ejaculation of semen goes backwards, up the penis and into the bladder.
sentences.cn: 所以射精时精液是逆向的，顺着阴茎向上到了膀胱里。

sentences.en: Take the new bladder and roll lengthwise into tube shape.
sentences.cn: 取来新的内胆,然后将其纵向卷成管状.

sentences.en: The bladder, as we have found out, is another.
sentences.cn: 我们还发现膀胱是另一组成部分。

sentences.en: The hormone that stimulates gall bladder contraction was called cholecystokinin.
sentences.cn: 刺激胆囊收缩的激素被称为胆囊收缩素.

sentences.en: The sky, swollen like a black bladder, rumbled and crackled.
sentences.cn: 天空中乌云黑沉沉地压下来，发出隆隆声和噼啪声。

sentences.en: Then the liver was eaten raw , flavored with the contents of the gall bladder.
sentences.cn: 然生吃带有胆囊味道的动物肝脏.

sentences.en: This fitting can now be pushed up inside the tank and bladder.
sentences.cn: 现在这个接头能够从罐子和内胆内推上来.

sentences.en: This might irritate your bladder and aggravate your condition.
sentences.cn: 这可能会刺激您的膀胱，并加剧您的病情。

sentences.en: Undercooked pork may contain living " bladder worms " of the pig tapeworm.
sentences.cn: 未煮熟的猪肉也许含有猪绦虫活的 “ 囊尾幼虫 ”.

words.tran_cn: [解剖]膀胱；囊状物，可充气的囊袋

trans.tran_cn: 膀胱，囊状物，水疱，空话连篇的人
trans.tran_en: the organ in your body that holds  urine (=  waste liquid  )  until it is passed out of your body
